_package_info.description: Character attributes and statistics for fantasy settings including physical abilities, mental traits, magical aptitudes, and social characteristics
_package_info.author: Storymaster

stat.name: Strength
stat.description: Physical power and muscle mass. Determines carrying capacity, melee damage, and ability to perform feats of raw power.

stat.name: Dexterity
stat.description: Agility, reflexes, and hand-eye coordination. Affects accuracy with ranged weapons, stealth, and acrobatic maneuvers.

stat.name: Constitution
stat.description: Health, stamina, and physical resilience. Determines hit points, resistance to disease, and endurance in harsh conditions.

stat.name: Intelligence
stat.description: Reasoning ability, memory, and analytical thinking. Affects spellcasting for wizards, skill points, and problem-solving capability.

stat.name: Wisdom
stat.description: Intuition, common sense, and spiritual awareness. Influences perception, divine magic, and understanding of the natural world.

stat.name: Charisma
stat.description: Force of personality, leadership ability, and social magnetism. Affects persuasion, intimidation, and certain magical abilities.

stat.name: Arcane Power
stat.description: Innate magical energy and connection to mystical forces. Determines mana pool and effectiveness of arcane spells.

stat.name: Divine Favor
stat.description: Blessing from deities and connection to divine realms. Influences holy magic, turning undead, and miraculous healing.

stat.name: Willpower
stat.description: Mental fortitude and resistance to magical influence. Protects against charm effects, fear, and mental domination.

stat.name: Luck
stat.description: Supernatural fortune and tendency for favorable outcomes. Affects critical hit chances, treasure finding, and avoiding disasters.

stat.name: Honor
stat.description: Reputation and adherence to moral codes. Influences social standing, trustworthiness, and certain magical abilities based on virtue.

stat.name: Nature Affinity
stat.description: Connection to the natural world and wild places. Affects druidic magic, animal handling, and survival in wilderness environments.

stat.name: Shadow Mastery
stat.description: Affinity for darkness and stealth-based abilities. Influences sneaking, backstab damage, and shadow magic effectiveness.

stat.name: Elemental Attunement
stat.description: Harmony with elemental forces of fire, water, earth, and air. Determines elemental spell power and resistance to elemental damage.

stat.name: Battle Fury
stat.description: Capacity for berserker rage and combat frenzy. Affects damage bonus when wounded and ability to ignore pain in battle.

stat.name: Psychic Sensitivity
stat.description: Ability to perceive thoughts, emotions, and spiritual energies. Influences telepathic abilities and detection of supernatural presence.

stat.name: Bloodline Power
stat.description: Inherited magical abilities from draconic, fey, or celestial ancestry. Affects sorcerous magic and supernatural racial abilities.

stat.name: Tactical Awareness
stat.description: Understanding of battlefield strategy and combat positioning. Improves initiative, flanking bonuses, and leadership abilities.

stat.name: Spiritual Purity
stat.description: Freedom from corruption and alignment with good forces. Protects against evil magic and enhances holy abilities.

stat.name: Artistic Talent
stat.description: Creative ability and aesthetic sense. Affects bardic magic, crafting beautiful items, and inspiring others through art.

stat.name: Primal Instinct
stat.description: Connection to savage, animalistic nature. Enhances survival skills, predator awareness, and shapeshifting abilities.

stat.name: Scholarly Knowledge
stat.description: Accumulated learning and research expertise. Affects spell research, ancient lore, and identification of magical items.

stat.name: Combat Reflexes
stat.description: Lightning-fast reactions in dangerous situations. Improves armor class, initiative, and ability to avoid surprise attacks.

stat.name: Empathy
stat.description: Ability to understand and connect with others emotionally. Affects healing magic, animal friendship, and diplomatic relations.

stat.name: Courage
stat.description: Bravery in the face of danger and supernatural fear. Provides immunity to fear effects and bonus when protecting others.
